title: Selective Kinetic Control of Interfacial Charge Transfer Reactions in Si-composite Anodes for Li-ion Batteries

In this report, we demonstrate a strategy to selectively suppress reactions at unpassivated active material surfaces in silicon composite electrodes, mitigating the capacity-draining effects of continual electrolyte reduction in alloying-type...
